mapper.select: /* memberMapper.attendanceList */ SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as row_num, atdinfo.attendance_seq, atdinfo.member_seq, ( SELECT name FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE member_seq = atdinfo.member_seq AND del_yn='N') AS name, ( SELECT phone FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE member_seq = atdinfo.member_seq AND del_yn='N') as phone, ( SELECT sex FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE member_seq = atdinfo.member_seq AND del_yn='N') as sex, atdinfo.attendance_date, atdinfo.register_date, atdinfo.register_id, atdinfo.modify_date, atdinfo.modify_id, atdinfo.del_yn, atdinfo.store_code FROM attendanceinfo atdinfo , (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) AS R WHERE atdinfo.store_code = #{storeCode} AND atdinfo.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY atdinfo.attendance_date DESC
